subsections.title: Amplifier Basics
subsections.label: subsec:amp-basics
prompts: Explain the concept of a transceiver, including its components and how it combines a receiver and transmitter.
Describe the function of the SSB/CW-FM switch on a VHF power amplifier and how it ensures proper operation in different modes.
Discuss the role of an RF power amplifier in increasing the transmitted output power from a transceiver.
Explain where an RF preamplifier is typically installed and its importance in the signal reception process.
